title: Improving how we deploy GitHub
description: As GitHub doubled it’s developer head count, tooling that worked for us no longer functioned in the same capacity. We aimed to improve the deployment process for all developers at GitHub and mitigate risk associated with deploying one of the largest developer platforms in the world.

title: Graphing 1000 repositories to identify key project types
description: What do you do when you need to identify a set of repos to test some big changes against, but you have a thousand to choose from? Answer: Break out some graph theory and model them out

title: The common edge case all dependency managers miss
description: Most dependency managers miss a very common "edge case" that impacts all developers. Let's look at why this is the case and a solution to address this.
